mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.eid, b.historicaltime as voctime, c.historicaltime as worktime from (select c.id, c.name, e.eid from tj_hchbdb_companyInfo c left join tj_hchbdb_companyInfo_equipment ce on c.id = ce.companyid left join tj_hchbdb_equipment e on ce.equipmentid = e.id where e.eid like '%V' or e.eid like '%G' and c.name like '%${name}%') a left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_air_historicalhoursvoc ) t where rn=1) b on a.eid = b.equipmentid left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_working_historicalhoursvalue ) t where rn=1) c on a.eid = c.equipmentid order by a.name desc

select a.id, a.name, a.eid, b.historicaltime as lamptime from (select c.id, c.name, e.eid from tj_hchbdb_companyInfo c left join tj_hchbdb_companyInfo_equipment ce on c.id = ce.companyid left join tj_hchbdb_equipment e on ce.equipmentid = e.id where e.eid like '%Y' and c.name like '%${name}%') a left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_lampblack_historicalhoursvalue ) t where rn=1) b on a.eid = b.equipmentid order by a.name desc

select a.id, a.name, a.eid, b.historicaltime as voctime worktime lamptime from (select c.id, c.name, e.eid from tj_hchbdb_companyInfo c left join tj_hchbdb_companyInfo_equipment ce on c.id = ce.companyid left join tj_hchbdb_equipment e on ce.equipmentid = e.id where c.id=#{id} and e.eid = #{eid}) a left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_air_historicalhoursvoc tj_hchbdb_working_historicalhoursvalue tj_hchbdb_lampblack_historicalhoursvalue ) t where rn=1) b on a.eid = b.equipmentid order by a.name desc

select a.id, a.name, a.eid, a.mtype, a.ctype, a.type, a.longitude, a.latitude, b.historicaltime as voctime, c.historicaltime as worktime from (select c.id, c.name, c.mtype, c.ctype, c.type, c.longitude, c.latitude, e.eid from tj_hchbdb_companyInfo c left join tj_hchbdb_companyInfo_equipment ce on c.id = ce.companyid left join tj_hchbdb_equipment e on ce.equipmentid = e.id where e.eid like '%V' or e.eid like '%G' and c.name like '%${name}%' and c.mtype = #{mtype} and c.ctype = #{ctype} and c.type = #{type}) a left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_air_historicalhoursvoc ) t where rn=1) b on a.eid = b.equipmentid left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_working_historicalhoursvalue ) t where rn=1) c on a.eid = c.equipmentid order by a.name desc

select a.id, a.name, a.eid, a.mtype, a.ctype, a.type, a.longitude, a.latitude, b.historicaltime as lamptime from (select c.id, c.name, c.mtype, c.ctype, c.type, c.longitude, c.latitude, e.eid from tj_hchbdb_companyInfo c left join tj_hchbdb_companyInfo_equipment ce on c.id = ce.companyid left join tj_hchbdb_equipment e on ce.equipmentid = e.id where e.eid like '%Y' and c.name like '%${name}%' and c.mtype = #{mtype} and c.ctype = #{ctype} and c.type = #{type}) a left join (select t.* from (select equipmentid, historicaltime ,row_number() over (partition by equipmentid order by historicaltime desc) rn from tj_hchbdb_lampblack_historicalhoursvalue ) t where rn=1) b on a.eid = b.equipmentid order by a.name desc
